tns:patch.author: jdeanquin
tns:patch.description: Default value for activity budget field

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_g_settings_default_activity_budget AS select -1 as id, 'None' as value union select id as id,category_value as value from amp_category_value where amp_category_class_id = (select id from amp_category_class where keyname='activity_budget' ) order by id
